name: Public Information
mission: In FY16, the Public Information Communication Program will be in the Mayor’s Office and the 24 Hour/Constituent Engagement Program will be moved to Neighborhood Services.

programs.head: Vacant
programs.program_description: The Communications Program uses print and electronic media to inform the public of the City’s handling of the local issues that affect them. The program conducts press conferences, arranges media interviews with the Mayor and City officials, issues press releases on events and initiatives, responds to media and public inquiries, and provides photographs of City events and programs for use by outside media outlets abd City departments.

programs.head: Jerome Smith
programs.program_description: The 24-Hour/Constituent Engagement Program provides a wide-ranging information and referral function as well as coordinates emergency response after business hours. The program also responds to citizens’ requests for service through direct interaction with City departments.
